CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 16, reads: "3. Crosley-Bendix appliances made a beautiful stage setting"
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men, women, and children, including boy wearing rolled up jeans, gathered under banner that reads "Crosley and Bendix Home Appliances Divisions Avco Manufacturing Corporation", at the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair in Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
